why.head: Why me
why.rightText: I am motivated to continuously learn new technologies and develop myself. My ability to solve complex problems and my passion for programming make me a valuable member for your team.

skills.head: My Skills
skills.textPartTwo: Staying motivated to expand my IT skills requires a strategic approach, a curious mindset, and a commitment to lifelong learning.
skills.textMobil: I am currently learning VueJs and React and I am motivated to continuously learn new technologies and develop myself.

ref.head: Need a teamplayer?
ref.head2: Here what my colleagues said about me
ref.userText1: Phil had to develop, format and deliver content in collaboration with the team members. He is a reliable and friendly person
ref.userText2: Phil knows how to use calc().
ref.userText3: Phil really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We wouldn't have got this far without his commitment.

contact.head: Contact me
contact.text: Still not sure if I'm the right person? Questions, interested in a collaboration or feedback on the portfolio? Simply fill in the form - you will receive a response as soon as possible.
contact.name: Your name
contact.policy3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contact.policyError: We ask for acceptance of the privacy policy
